attributes.action: Promote the use of British Sigh Language as a Common European Language
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British Sign Language (BSL) is commonly used across Europe by those using a sign language. It is a fully functioning natural langage with a good existing base of users. It makes sense to push it as a common communication tool for Europe. Start teaching it in schools now and in a generation we will have a common European language with all the advantages of improved business and cultural links that Europe is meant to bring.
